title: Easter fairy cakes
ingredients: ['For the fairy cakes', '140g self-raising flour', '120g butter, softened', '85g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '2 tbls cocoa powder', 'For the icing', '100g milk or dark chocolate, melted', '120g butter, softened', '120g icing sugar', 'For decorating', 'Large bag of mini eggs']
